items.title: View context
items.body:
#1036

- Needs a test or two.
- Potentially needs discussion about deprecation solution and if there are alternatives that might be preferable.

items.title: Added assertBody(equals: String...)
items.body:
I added this because the only `assetBody` method was just to test if the body contained something. This makes it easy to check if the body is a specific string value.

I apologize this was forked off of my brach for this PR #1063, if necessary I can separate this change out, but it sounds like that PR will be accepted so if good this could be accepted right after.

items.title: Square brackets encoding
items.body:
I attempted to fix this issue just to contribute a little bit.

Although I'm not sure if there's any other place that I'd have to improve.

I ran VaporTests and it is passing.

#1055

items.title: add ability to configure config w/ absolute directory
add file and line info to abort error
items.body:
Adds file information to the abort error. This will make it easier to track down where the error is being thrown.

- [ ] discuss whether adding this to `Debuggable` would be beneficial

items.title: Fixed request query accessor storing bytes instead of node in Request
items.body: This was causing the query getter always returning nil if the query has been set with a node.

items.title: temporarily disable proxy tests
items.body: proxy server is no logner available, causing all PRs to fail.
